: : Rodimus Prime : :
He knew they were right. He had to be strong. They were faceing many evils at this time. The plague, Hydras, Tripredacus and now and evil Prime.
Rodimus gets back to his feet.
Rodimus Prime: I just recieved a comm message from Ultra Magnus. A new change has happened on Cybertron. The Tripredacus rebuilt Optimus Prime in an evil form. He has already taken over Cybertron, and he is comeing here...
 CatMaster o <catmastero@...> wrote:"What's going on? Who's is him?" Kenzo asked little nearves.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airshadow Nightstar" <airly2002@h...>
wrote:
> Comdor::

Condor heard all and said "Sir, you cant collapse now... You must...
have to be brave... We can defend ourself but I'm worried about one...
About Nightlight, I guess that she's your girl... If you aren't brave
for us then be brave for her... Perhaps she is more danger than us,
'cause, I hate to say this, I feel that she isn't enoug power to
defend herself...
